definition: mouth of a spring or fountain
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: The water was spilling out of the mouth of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 泉眼中不断地涌出泉水。

sentences.english: He knew that there was a spring farther up.
sentences.chinese: 他知道上面有一个泉眼。

sentences.english: It springs up from a fountain in the courtyard of a bewitched castle;
sentences.chinese: 救命水呀，是从一个魔宫院内的泉眼里冒出来的。

sentences.english: Silent spring cherish trickle, according to love clear water shade supple.
sentences.chinese: 泉眼无声惜细流，树阴照水爱晴柔。

sentences.english: We fell prone on the ground and drank water from the spring.
sentences.chinese: 我们伏在地面上喝泉眼里的水。

sentences.english: Fount, Tree, and Shed are gone, I know not whither.
sentences.chinese: 泉眼，树木和小屋消失了，我不知身在何地。

sentences.english: Nearby springs provide a constant supply of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 邻近的泉眼提供了固定的新鲜水源。

sentences.english: See, So many bubble rise from the mouth of spring , It's very hot.
sentences.chinese: 看看，这里的泉眼还一直冒着热腾腾的气泡呢。

definition: water so clear you can see the bottom
